Snickerdoodles

Yield: 8 dozen cookies

dessert
cookies

Ingredients

  • 1 cup butter
  • 2 cups white sugar
  • 2 eggs
  • 1/4 cup milk
  • 1 tsp vanilla
  • 3 3/4 cups AP flour
  • 1/2 tsp baking soda
  • 1/2 tsp cream of tartar
  • 1/2 tsp salt

Procedure

  1. In mixing bowl cream butter and sugar till light and fluffy.
  2. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each. Blend in milk and vanilla.
  3. Thoroughly stir together flour, baking soda, cream of tartar, and salt; stir into creamed mixture.
  4. Form dough into 1-inch balls. Place balls 2 inches apart on greased cookie sheet. Lightly flatten balls with sugared bottom of tumbler.
  5. Bake cookies at 375Â° till done, 10 to 12 minutes.
